description: This file defines a pluggable notes service with strategies for localStorage persistence and a placeholder for REST API integration. It exports a singleton instance of the localStorage-based strategy.

classes.name: LocalStorageStrategy
classes.description: Implements the NotesStrategy interface to persist notes in browser localStorage.

classes.name: RestApiStrategy
classes.description: Placeholder class for future backend integration, implementing the NotesStrategy interface.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves notes from localStorage or throws an error if not implemented.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves notes to localStorage or throws an error if not implemented.
